title: Epic: Research and implement Haskell parser
body:
Research and decide on parser technique for Haskell. Options: reuse GHC's Alex/Happy grammar, tree-sitter-haskell, or hand-written recursive descent. Must implement full Haskell 2010 layout rule and full Unicode.

**Key decisions**: #14, #17 in DESIGN.md
**Sub-tasks to split later**: lexer, parser, layout rule, Unicode handling
